ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'International_Enquiry', OR( ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Pending Closure'), AND( ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Closed'), OR( ISPICKVAL( Closure_Code__c, 'Response Given'), ISPICKVAL( Closure_Code__c, 'Redirected') ) ) ), LEN ( Closure_Details__c ) <= 20 )
